NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Chemistry and Researcher or the cell corresponding to Computer Science and Researcher?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Chemistry} and {Researcher} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Literature and Faculty or the cell corresponding to Physics and Faculty?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Physics} and {Faculty} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Chemistry and Junior or the cell corresponding to Engineering and Sophomore?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Chemistry} and {Junior} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Mathematics and Junior or the cell corresponding to History and Sophomore?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Mathematics} and {Junior} has a higher heat value.
